```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(reshape)
library(DESeq2)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv('anticodoncounts.csv', header=TRUE, sep=',')
coldata <- read.csv(file='headerinfo.csv', head=TRUE, sep=',')
data[7] <- NULL
data[7] <- NULL
coldata<-coldata[-6,]
	
matrix.please<-function(x) {
    m<-as.matrix(x[,-1])
    rownames(m)<-x[,1]
    m
}

data <- matrix.please(data)
is.numeric(data)

dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = data,
                              colData = coldata,
                              design = ~ treatment)


dds <- DESeq(dds)


res<-results(dds)
res[order(res$padj),]
```
